Company Name: Abdullah Abdul Mohsen Al Khodari Sons (1330)
Description: Abdullah Abdul Mohsen Al Khodari Sons (known as: Al Khodari) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since October 2010. Al Khodari operates within the Capital Goods sector focusing on Construction and Engineering. It has Companies operating across Qatar, Kuwait and UAE, working on Construction and Engineering. Al Khodari is based in Dammam, Saudi Arabia and was established in February 1966.
